==== Introduction ====
Welcome to my Wiki homepage. I've been using Ubuntu since HoaryHedgehog and helped start the SriLankanTeam. I'm a member of NewUserMentors group and try to help new Ubuntu users by providing support in #ubuntu and #ubuntu-lk. You can find me on irc as ''lastnode''.
